title: Snag Mystery Icons and Mystery Wards!

replies.body: that moment you go to buy these but it says you can't cause you own them all already {{item:3070}}

So now legacy wards and icons are as easy to get as anything else. 
How great is that.
The longer I stay with this game the more I accept the idea from all those people who went about how Riot was always trying to make money.

Well, they are a game company and their only game is free to play (Riot Games; the "S" is a lie). 

Only an idiot would think that they won't try to make money somehow... They have bills to pay too.
I agree with you but they make like over $1'000'000 like every month or some shit
if anyone else were in the same position they would do the same.
They are called "Legacy" skins becasue there are points they WILL return to the store for purchase, when riot chooses to do so. So im not sure what this has to do with anything

i want them to make a palm tree ward or something to along with the pool party theme
 {{summoner:31}}
why is it that ward skins and icons have combined total limit of 5, not separately?
Riot is there anyway you can give me like 10 rp because i have 140 and i dont really want to purchase a 10 rp card so is there anyway you can help me out
Go to support lol.. they might be able to help u{{champion:103}}
They price items so that it's highly likely you never spend *all* your RP.. It's an incentive to spend more.
i have 390 rp for the mystery wards :D i was going to get a skin boost in aram so happy i didnt lol
That moment when you have 146 rp... {{champion:32}}
Just spent my RP, I go here and see this>? {{item:3070}}
